crs_2000_21 %>% 
  filter(recipient_region %in% c('Africa', 'South of Sahara')) %>% 
  summarize(value = sum(value_usd_2021, na.rm = TRUE),
            n_project = n(),
            .by = c(year, recipient)) %>%
  arrange(desc(value)) %>% 
  top_n(order_by = year, n = 3)
